name: MESA generator
description:
This is a short demo of generate Mesa

In this game，Player can generate a Mesa and destroy it

1. For camera using"

Use W (front)A(left)S(right) D (back) to move to camera

Use Q （right） E （left） rotate the camera

Use F （Zoom out）, Use R (Zoom in)

2. click the button to exit game, generate mesa and destroy it

Wish you enjoy this simulator :)
